Innovators at Every Level
At Greyscale, our vibrant team shares a passion for creativity and sustainability in every project. From seasoned architects to eager interns, we collaborate to bring unique perspectives to residential, commercial, and hospitality spaces. We're always seeking to leave our mark on the next landmark, balancing visionary design with functionality.
Shaping the Creative Minds of Tomorrow
We believe in fostering the next generation of design professionals. Our interns are an integral part of the team, contributing fresh ideas and new perspectives while learning from industry experts.
Join us — withus@greyscale.in
